Texts Surrounding Texts
Manuscripts
All manuscripts Ancien fonds Ariel collection Burnouf collection Cordier collection Ducler collection Haas collection Vinson collection
Tools
TST editor Quick palaeographer Tamil transcription
Paratexts
Blessings Colophons Headers Invocations Ownership statements Satellite stanzas Tables of contents Titles TBC
XylothÃ¨que

Blessings

In the TST Project, we define blessings as short prose, regularly formulaic phrases, often written in the margins, which are meant to attract auspiciousness, but can also express a credo or reverence to a god or a spiritual master.
